courseDescription:
This free online Office Professionalism training course will provide you with an understanding of positioning yourself as a professional. You will learn about professional behavior and attitudes in the workplace as well as learn to explain how to make changes through personal accountability. Next, you will learn about assessing your image, understanding your position and then enhancing your professional image to become more marketable.

Furthermore, this online course then explains time and project management techniques by helping you identify stressors that can impact work and teach you better long-term planning techniques. Next, you will learn how to enhance your role in the office and how to communicate for improved results. You will also learn about the keys to effective communication, including listening and expression of thoughts. The course will also go over more effective presentations and meetings.

This course then wraps up with building relationships and networks, where you will learn about networking and roles within the office. Studying this free online course will be of great benefit to any person who wants to improve his or her professional qualities, work ethic, and work experience in order to become a desirable employee for any company. Enroll in this course today and start learning about professionalism in the workplace.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Positioning Yourself as a Professional, students will learn about how their attitude affects them in the workplace. This module will cover the attitude projected by professionals and how to behave professionally as well as how to make changes in attitude through personal accountability.
topics: Topic A - Attitude in the Workplace
Topic C - Making Changes through Personal Accountability

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Enhancing Your Professional Image, students will learn about ways in which they can enhance their professional image. This module will take a look at enhancing your image as a whole, how to become more marketable as an individual, and the best processes for communication in regards to your image.
topics: Topic A - Your Image as a Whole

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Expanding Your Skills, students will learn about methods with which they can expand upon their skills. This module will begin by discussing time management and how important time management is in a professional environment. Students will then learn about project management techniques as well as the process for making decisions.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Communicating for Results, students will learn about communicating for the best results. We will start by discussing keys to effective communication in a professional setting, then we will take a look at giving presentations to communicate ideas and plans. This module will then wrap up by discussing meetings.
topics: Topic A - Keys to Effective Communication

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Building Relationships and Networks, students will learn about the process for building relationships and networks. This module will start by taking a look at work and your personality and how the two work together. Students will then learn about networking effectively as well as roles in the office environment.
topics: Topic A - Work and Your Personality
Topic C - Roles in the Office
